main.java.controller

Class MainViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.controller.MainViewController

  • public class MainViewController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the main controller of the application. It controls all actions and choose wich API will be use between Amazon and Microsoft

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MainViewController()
      This constructor initialize the different used lists and clean the temp file directory and choose wich API will be use.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MainViewController

        public MainViewController()
        This constructor initialize the different used lists and clean the temp file directory and choose wich API will be use. It initialize the camera id too.

    • Method Detail

      • displayImage

        public void displayImage(java.lang.String id)
        This method display the right image on the right box
        Parameters:
        id - used to find the right file in the working directory

      • getScaleXRatio

        public double getScaleXRatio()
        This method is used to get the right ratio in horizontal axis between the displayed ImageView and the reel image.
        Returns:
        the horizontal ratio between the ImageView and the real image.

      • getScaleYRatio

        public double getScaleYRatio()
        This method is used to get the right ratio in vertical axis between the displayed ImageView and the reel image.
        Returns:
        the vertical ratio between the ImageView and the real image.

      • displayPersonInformations

        public void displayPersonInformations(IPerson person)
        This method show the detail informations of somebody into the labels
        Parameters:
        person - The person to be displayed

      • openAddFaceDialog

        public void openAddFaceDialog()
        This method create and show an AddView face with the current selected face.

      • drawRectangleAllPersons

        public void drawRectangleAllPersons(java.util.List<IPerson> persons)
        This method draw a green rectangle on each detected face.
        Parameters:
        persons - a list of detected people.

      • drawRectangleKnownPersons

        public void drawRectangleKnownPersons(java.util.List<IPerson> persons)
        This method draw a red rectangle on each identified face.
        Parameters:
        persons - a list of detected people.

      • startCamera

        protected void startCamera()
        The action triggered by pushing the start button on the GUI. It create the webcam stream with two threads to grab the frames. The first will display the live on the left box and the second display on image per 3 seconds on the right box.

      • stopCamera

        protected void stopCamera()
        The action triggered by pushing the stop button on the GUI It stop the camera if it running and update the buttons status.

      • saveFrame

        public void saveFrame(org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Mat frame)
        Save a mat in a jpg image. It saves it with the currentTime name.
        Parameters:
        frame - the Mat to save in a file.

      • saveVideoFrame

        public void saveVideoFrame(org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Mat frame,
                           int frameNumb)
        Save a mat in a jpg image. It used in video mode and saves the picture with is frame number.
        Parameters:
        frame - the Mat to save in a file.
        frameNumb - the number of the frame to save.

      • updateImageView

        public void updateImageView(javafx.scene.image.ImageView view,
                            javafx.scene.image.Image image)
        Update the ImageView in the JavaFX main thread
        Parameters:
        view - the ImageView to update
        image - the Image to show

      • exitApplication

        public void exitApplication(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Triggered when the user click on the exit icon. It calls the method to clean directories and stop threads.
        Parameters:
        event -

      • isBoxSelected

        public boolean isBoxSelected()
        Check the autorefreshBox and send it is status
        Returns:
        true if the refresh box is checked, false otherwise.

      • updateTimeLabelFrameNumber

        public void updateTimeLabelFrameNumber(int counter)
        This method is used in video mode, it update the time label with the current frame and update the frame index.
        Parameters:
        counter - the diplayed frame index.
